channel.title: VitalizePK 614 | Hybrid Paradise
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dCLDd9V.png[/img]
[B]Introduction;[/B]
It's been a while since Vitalize was online, we were previously a 317 but times were hard which led to the closure of the server unfortunately. The 614 has been in development for many weeks and I hope all problems are at a minimum so you guys can have a fun and enjoyable experience. If you're a previous Vitalize member and you have some sort of proof then I'll be more than happy to give you veteran rank. The new Vitalize is ALL - PvP, after some thought and consideration the idea of PvM has been scrapped due to it playing too low of a part in a master and spawn server. To replace this we've included content that fits in perfectly with a PvP server; Mini-games such as Duel arena, Fight pits etc. If you're looking for a relaxed and friendly environment & community to fight your friends in then this is the perfect server for you!
[B]Links;[/B]
> [url=http://vitalizepk.com/]Home Page[/url] > [url=http://vitalizepk.com/forums]Forums[/url] > [url=http://vitalizepk.com/webclient.html]Webclient[/url] > [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/36288851/Vitalize614.jar]Desktop Client[/url][/CENTER]
[b]Features;[/b]
[ul][li]Loyalty Titles[/li] [li]Flawless Switching[/li] [li]Enchant Combat[/li] [li]Clean Client[/li] [li]Fight Pits[/li] [li]Duel Arena[/li] [li]Registered Domain[/li] [li]Purchased vBulletin Forums[/li] [li]Server & Forums updated frequently[/li] [li]Friendly community[/li] [li]Various PK teleports[/li][/ul]
[CENTER][b]Media;[/b]
Sick of seeing the same G.E home on every 614? So are we that's why our home is located in the nicely laid out Yanille. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/52bTWk2.png[/img]
Various ways to teleport around; our newests being Lumber yard method. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/k9Y2Zqq.png[/img]
Clan wars will be taking place here; Working on a system that counts how many users are taking part to stop people coming back to make it fair. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qL1TJNh.png[/img]
There aren't a lot of images you can show off with a PK server, CHECK IT OUT if you want a live demo;)[/CENTER]

item.title: VitalizePK 614 | Hybrid Paradise
item.dc:creator: @Xx_Weed_Xx Xx Weed Xx
item.description:
@Xx_Weed_Xx wrote:

[CENTER]

Introduction;

It’s been a while since Vitalize was online, we were previously a 317 but times were hard which led to the closure of the server unfortunately. The 614 has been in development for many weeks and I hope all problems are at a minimum so you guys can have a fun and enjoyable experience. If you’re a previous Vitalize member and you have some sort of proof then I’ll be more than happy to give you veteran rank. The new Vitalize is ALL - PvP, after some thought and consideration the idea of PvM has been scrapped due to it playing too low of a part in a master and spawn server. To replace this we’ve included content that fits in perfectly with a PvP server; Mini-games such as Duel arena, Fight pits etc. If you’re looking for a relaxed and friendly environment & community to fight your friends in then this is the perfect server for you!

Forums
Webclient

[CENTER]Media;

Sick of seeing the same G.E home on every 614? So are we that’s why our home is located in the nicely laid out Yanille.

Various ways to teleport around; our newests being Lumber yard method.

There aren’t a lot of images you can show off with a PK server, CHECK IT OUT if you want a live demo;)[/CENTER]
